title: The National Forest Serial Killer // 73
description:
In 2007, a string of murders were committed in national parks and forests across the Southeastern United States. After a description of the possible killer is released on national television, a man in Georgia gives the police the name of a very good suspect. This is the story of The National Forest Serial Killer and the murders of Irene & John Bryant, Cheryl Dunlap, and Meredith Emerson.

PATREON BONUS EPISODES:
patreon.com/goingwestpodcast

CASE SOURCES

https://www.floridasupremecourt.org/content/download/347749/3066975/11-898_ini.pdf

http://maamodt.asp.radford.edu/Psyc%20405/serial%20killers/Hilton,%20Gary%20Michael.pdf

https://www.transylvaniatimes.com/story/2008/02/05/front-page/john-bryants-body-found-in-forest/3894.html

https://www.blueridgenow.com/article/NC/20120327/News/606022032/HT

https://www.ajc.com/news/local/tragic-end-for-unique-couple/PzAHQbeBqHLPzNjGei0nAJ/

https://www.wjhg.com/home/headlines/12637726.html

https://www.ajc.com/news/local/gary-michael-hilton-convicted-florida-murder-case/XKsSX7AUKwXqvpQCg2QyBN/

https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/atlanta/obituary.aspx?n=meredith-emerson&pid=100978180&fhid=3592

http://www.nbcnews.com/id/23769881/ns/us_news-crime_and_courts/t/killer-says-female-hiker-fought-him-end/#.XufH7i2ZPow

http://charleyproject.org/case/rossana-miliani

https://www.news-journalonline.com/article/LK/20071223/NEWS/180117745/DN
